analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BMCPlatform.changeOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#837-869):
	External calls:
	- errorCode = checkIsOnlyOwner(_symbol) (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#839)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- assets (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#862)
	- holderIndex (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#849-851)

Reentrancy in BMCPlatform.distrust (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#910-914):
	External calls:
	- errorCode = shouldBeTrusted(msg.sender,_to) (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#911-912)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holders (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#912-914)

Reentrancy in BMCPlatform.massTransfer (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#542-587):

	- require(bool)(checkIsOnlyOwner(_symbol) == OK) (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#547)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- holderIndex (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#552-553)
	- holderIndex (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#581)

	External calls:

Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#103-113) does not use the value returned by external calls:

BMCPlatform.setProxy._address (local variable @ /unique_chucks/11/0x939c0304e9033761e4b510a93386ba3bebc983ba.sol#530) shadows:
